name: Chaotic Entropy
title: Sucrose: Chaotic Entropy
desc: The wild winds gather â€” and amidst the chaos, victory.

source: Reward for inviting Sucrose to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1501], equip this card.
After $[A1501] equips this card, immediately use $[S15013] once.
After the Large Wind Spirit created by your $[A1501], who had this card equipped, has converted to another Elemental Type: Deal +1 DMG of this Elemental Type.
(You must have $[A1501] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
